actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: To authorize the Attorney General to make grants to certain law enforcement officers in reimbursement for costs incurred by such officers in certain legal actions arising out of the performance of official duties.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to make grants to law enforcement officers in reimbursement for costs incurred by such officers in legal actions arising out of the performance of official duties if such law enforcement officer should prevail in the civil action.

titles.title: To authorize the Attorney General to make grants to certain law enforcement officers in reimbursement for costs incurred by such officers in certain legal actions arising out of the performance of official duties.
